thread.section_title: Outsource Data Recovery Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Outsource Data Recovery | outsourcedatarecovery.com
thread.title: JWLord
thread.title_full: Outsource Data Recovery reviewed by JWLord

author: JWLord
title: JWLord
text: I sent my hard drive in for a free estimate with the shipping label they provided me. They gave me a really good price so I authorized the repair and my drive was fixed and returned to me in no time. They offered many options for shipping, and for the way the data could be recovered. Very polite customer service and professional. Highly recommend!
